title: Introduction
code: ggplot(economics) +   geom_line(aes(date, unemploy), color = closest_mnb_color("blue")) +   theme_mnb_ts(base_size = 16) +    labs(subtitle = "Munkanélküliség az USA-ban") +    scale_y_number() options(lang = "en")  ggplot(economics) +   geom_line(aes(date, unemploy), color = closest_mnb_color("blue")) +   theme_mnb_ts(base_size = 16) +    labs(subtitle = "Unemployment in the USA") +    scale_y_number()

title: Introduction
text: developed function simple rewrite user specified colors ones matches corporate style.

title: Introduction
code: data(mtcars)  mtcars |>    head() |>    tibble::rowid_to_column("model type") |> # long colname   gt_mnb(title = "MTcars dataset", comment = "This is a built-in dataset")

title: Introduction
code: library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union  economics |>    select(date, unemploy, psavert) |>    mutate(across(2:3, \(x) x / lag(x) - 1)) |>   tail(10) |>    tidyr::pivot_longer(- 1) |>    ggplot(aes(date, name, fill = value)) +   geom_tile(color = "black") +   theme_mnb_ts(base_size = 16) +    scale_fill_mnb_divergent_b() +   labs(subtitle = "Macrostatistics of the USA", fill = "Relative m-o-m change")

title: Authors and Citation
text: Marcell Granát. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Granát M (2024). mnbplots: GGplot template functions MNB. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {mnbplots: GGplot template and functions for MNB},   author = {Marcell Granát},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

what: GGplot template and functions for MNB
title: GGplot template and functions for MNB
text: mnbplots collection color palettes themes specifically designed MNB. palettes designed accessible follow color scheme Brand Guidelines. package includes theme ggplot2, scales ggplot2, utility functions working colors. package designed easy use make easy create standard visualizations across team. package CRAN, install directly GitHub.

Find the closest MNB Color — closest_mnb_color
text: colors character vector color names hexadecimal codes. limit Numeric. maximum RGB distance allowed match. Default 200.

text: character vector closest matching MNB colors original color match found within limit.

what: Create an MNB-styled GT Table — gt_mnb

title: Create an MNB-styled GT Table — gt_mnb
Create an MNB-styled GT Table — gt_mnb
text: data data frame GT table object styled. title Optional. string used table title. comment Optional. string added source note table.

title: Create an MNB-styled GT Table — gt_mnb
text: GT table object MNB styling applied.

title: Create an MNB-styled GT Table — gt_mnb
code: iris |>    head() |>    gt_mnb(title = "Random title", comment = "Source: This is a built-in dataset")     Random title     Sepal.length       Sepal.width       Petal.length       Petal.width       Species     5,10 3,50 1,40 20,00% setosa4,90 3,00 1,40 20,00% setosa4,70 3,20 1,30 20,00% setosa4,60 3,10 1,50 20,00% setosa5,00 3,60 1,40 20,00% setosa5,40 3,90 1,70 40,00% setosaSource: This is a built-in dataset

what: MNB divergent colors for ggplot2 — scale_color_discrete_mnb_divergent
title: MNB divergent colors for ggplot2 — scale_color_discrete_mnb_divergent
text: function creates color scale using MNB color palette ggplot2.

title: MNB divergent colors for ggplot2 — scale_color_discrete_mnb_divergent
MNB divergent colors for ggplot2 — scale_color_discrete_mnb_divergent
text: ggplot2 color scale object.

title: MNB divergent colors for ggplot2 — scale_color_discrete_mnb_divergent
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot2::ggplot(iris) +    ggplot2::aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species) +   ggplot2::geom_point(size = 3) +    scale_color_discrete_mnb_divergent()

title: MNB Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb

MNB Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb
text: values Optional. vector color names. translated closest MNB color.

text: ggplot2 color scale object.

title: MNB Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot2::ggplot(iris) +    ggplot2::aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species) +   ggplot2::geom_point(size = 3) +    scale_color_mnb()   ggplot2::ggplot(iris) +    ggplot2::aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species) +   ggplot2::geom_point(size = 3) +    scale_color_mnb(values = c("red4", "blue", "yellow"))

what: MNB Divergent Binned Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb_divergent_b
title: MNB Divergent Binned Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb_divergent_b
text: function creates binned fill scale using MNB (Magyar Nemzeti Bank) divergent color palette ggplot2.

title: MNB Divergent Binned Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb_divergent_b
code: scale_color_mnb_divergent_b(   n.breaks = NULL,   breaks = waiver(),   rev = FALSE,   ... )

title: MNB Divergent Binned Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb_divergent_b
text: n.breaks Optional. Number breaks binned scale. NULL, number breaks determined breaks parameter. breaks Optional. vector break points binned scale. Default waiver(), lets ggplot2 determine breaks. rev Logical. TRUE, reverses order colors. Default FALSE. ... Additional arguments passed ggplot2::binned_scale().

title: MNB Divergent Binned Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb_divergent_b
text: ggplot2 binned fill scale object using MNB divergent color palette.

title: MNB Divergent Binned Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb_divergent_b
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, fill = Petal.Length)) +    geom_point() +   scale_color_mnb_divergent_b(n.breaks = 5, rev = TRUE) #> Error in as.vector(x, "character"): cannot coerce type 'closure' to vector of type 'character'
